definition[0]: something that is on display is in a public place where people can look at it
example[0]: Mapplethorpe’s photographs were first put on display in New York.
example[1]: One of the world’s oldest cars has gone on display in Brighton today.
definition[1]: if a quality, feeling, or skill is on display, it is very clear and easy to notice
example[2]: The musical talent on display is extremely impressive.
